Subroutine vom_add_daily

1383 : 
1384 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1385 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1386 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1387 : 
1388 :       subroutine vom_add_daily ()
1389 :       use vegwatmod
1390 :       use vegmod
1391 :       use watmod
1392 :       implicit none
1393 : 
1394 :       netassvec(d___)  = netassvec(d___) + hass_(2) - 3600.d0 * (cpcc_ + rr_ + tc_)
1395 : !     * rl does not need to be included here as ass=-rl if j=0 (at night)
1396 :       netassvecg(d___) = netassvecg(d___) + hassg(2,2) - 3600.d0       &
1397 :      &                 * (cpccg(2) + rrg + tcg(2))
1398 : 
1399 :       ruptk_d  = ruptk_d  + SUM(ruptkvec(:)) * 3600.d0
1400 :       vd_d     = vd_d     + vd__
1401 :       jmax_d   = jmax_d   + jmax__(2)
1402 :       jmaxg_d  = jmaxg_d  + jmaxg__(2)
1403 :       gstom_d  = gstom_d  + gstom__
1404 :       gstomg_d = gstomg_d + gstomg__(2,2)
1405 :       etm_d    = etm_d    + hetm_
1406 :       etmg_d   = etmg_d   + hetmg
1407 :       esoil_d  = esoil_d  + hesoil
1408 :       spgfcf_d = spgfcf_d + hspgfcf
1409 :       infx_d   = infx_d   + hinfx
1410 :       rl_d     = rl_d     + rl__(2) * 3600.d0  ! rl_d in mol/day
1411 :       rlg_d    = rlg_d    + rlg__(2,2) * 3600.d0
1412 : 
1413 :       return
1414 :       end subroutine vom_add_daily
